title: Completed!:Looking to Upgrade My Red Portrait Cobb
author: Piratedogcardshows

posts.post_title: Completed!:Looking to Upgrade My Red Portrait Cobb
posts.post_content: Hello,well now that my T206 Red Portrait Ty Cobb is officially sold im looking to upgrade hopefully by the end of the week.Im looking for preferably a SGC graded card,40-50.If you have one available that fits this description please let me know.Thanks for any help.Jason Wells
